sponsor: Consorzio per Valutazioni Biologiche e Farmacologiche
briefTitle: Efficacy/Safety Study of Deferiprone Compared to Deferasirox in Paediatric Patients
officialTitle: Multicentre, Randomised, Open Label, Non-inferiority Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Deferiprone Compared to Deferasirox in Patients Aged From 1 Month to Less Than 18 Years Affected by Transfusion Dependent Haemoglobinopathies
summary: Multicentre, randomised, open label, non-inferiority active-controlled trial to evaluate efficacy and safety of a 12-months treatment with deferiprone (DFP) at dose of 75-100 mg/kg/day versus deferasirox (DFX) at dose of 20-40 mg/kg/day in paediatric patients (1 month \< 18 years old) affected by hereditary haemoglobinopathies and requiring frequent transfusions and chelation.
